Headline: #50 Damen Temporary Reroute at Damen/Ohio
ShortDescription: 50 Damen buses are temporarily rerouted via Damen, Chicago, Western, Grand & Damen, due to police activity near Damen/Ohio.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#50 Damen buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Damen, Chicago, Western, Grand, then resume their normal route on Damen, due to police activity near Damen/Ohio.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #36 Broadway Temporary Reroute at Broadway/Halsted
ShortDescription: 36 Broadway buses are temporarily rerouted via Broadway, West Sheridan, Inner Lake Shore Drive, Addison & Broadway, due to street blockage near Broadway/Halsted

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#36 Broadway buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Broadway, West Sheridan, Inner Lake Shore Drive, Addison, then resume their normal route on Broadway, due to street blockage near Broadway/Halsted.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier sick customer at UIC-Halsted. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier sick customer at UIC-Halsted.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
